title-group.article-title: CONVERGENCE ANALYSIS OF A CLASS OF MASSIVELY PARALLEL DIRECTION SPLITTING ALGORITHMS FOR THE NAVIER-STOKES EQUATIONS IN SIMPLE DOMAINS

abstract.p: We provide a convergence analysis for a new fractional time-stepping technique for the incompressible Navier-Stokes equations based on direction splitting. This new technique is of linear complexity, unconditionally stable and convergent, and suitable for massive parallelization.
